name: Homestuck Troll Name Generator
description: Craving a fantastically quirky name worthy of a Homestuck troll? Look no further! Our generator conjures up unique troll names faster than you can say 'Alternia'. Get ready to embrace your inner grey-skinned, horn-sporting persona!
introduction: Dive into the whimsical world of Homestuck with our Troll Name Generator! Whether you're roleplaying, creating fanfiction, or just looking for a ridiculously cool name, we've got you covered. Prepare for names that are both absurd and strangely fitting for the denizens of Alternia.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button! (It's the one that looks like it's begging to be clicked.)
Marvel at the glorious troll name that appears before your very eyes.
If the name doesn't quite tickle your fancy, hit 'Generate' again! We've got more troll names than you can shake a grub at.
Feel free to mix and match prefixes and suffixes for extra troll-tastic customization.
Use your new troll name wisely... and maybe start a meteor-dodging club. You know, just in case.

faqs.question: Are these names 'canon' Homestuck troll names?
faqs.answer: While we draw inspiration from the *Homestuck* universe, these names are randomly generated and not officially canon. Think of them as loving tributes to the wild creativity of the original!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my original characters (OCs)?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! That's what they're for! Go forth and create the most gloriously bizarre troll OC the internet has ever seen.

faqs.question: Will this generator help me understand the deeper meaning of *Homestuck*?
faqs.answer: Erm... probably not. But it will give you a cool name to ponder the deeper meaning *with*! Baby steps, right?

faqs.question: Are the names generated appropriate for all ages?
faqs.answer: We've tried to keep things relatively tame, but some names might lean towards the darker side of Alternian culture. Use your best judgment, especially if younger users are involved.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way, and we might just add them to the mix. The more ridiculous, the better!

faqs.question: Why are troll names so weird?
faqs.answer: Because *Homestuck*! Embrace the weirdness, my friend. It's part of the charm.
